thread.title: Willy A Bachofen (WAB) -Dispersion and Wet Milling Technology for Pharmaceuticals
thread.title_full: Willy A Bachofen (WAB) -Dispersion and Wet Milling Technology for Pharmaceuticals

title: Willy A Bachofen (WAB) -Dispersion and Wet Milling Technology for Pharmaceuticals
text:
Willy A Bachofen (WAB) provides dispersion and wet milling technology for the pharmaceutical industry through the DYNO-MILL brand. Processing services for active pharmaceutical ingredients 
The DYNO-MILL range of products process active pharmaceutical ingredients and reliably specifies particle size distribution. 
WAB has two other brands TURBULA and dyna-MIX for the application of 3D dry mixing that achieves homogenous results. 
The company has an R&D and a production facility at its headquarters in Basel / Muttenz in Switzerland. Fine dispersion and grinding technology 
WAB specialises in agitator bead mills for particle size reduction through a mechanical breakdown. It is used to create particles of a determined distribution profile, and increase the solid content surface area. 
Dispersion and wet fine grinding of pumpable products with low to high viscosity is available, with sizes from 50nm to 500um, which can be processed in an enclosed system. 3D mixing for pharmaceutical applications 
TURBULA and dyna-MIX shaker mixers are based on controlled 3D movements. The mixers ensure a gentle, constant and reproducible mixing process for demanding pharmaceutical applications. About Willy A Bachofen 
WAB provides continuous support, high-quality performance, service and on-time deliveries for clients in the pharmaceuticals industry. 
WAB has subsidiaries in Germany, France, the UK, China and India, with more than 40 sales and service points worldwide. Contact Details
